metadata.dc:author: Pineda Herrero, R
Cuadrado Blázquez, M
Medrano Martorell, S
Garcia Figueredo, D
metadata.dc:description: We report a case of hypopharyngeal squamous cell carcinoma with multiple calcified metastatic cervical adenopathies, and we review the relevant literature. The finding of calcified metastatic adenopathies from squamous cell carcinoma in the head and neck is very uncommon; only three cases have been reported to date.
metadata.dc:title: Calcificación en adenopatías cervicales metastásicas de carcinoma escamoso.
[Calcification in metastatic cervical adenopathies from squamous cell carcinoma].
